mapper.sql: FINANCE_ID, FINANCE_SERIAL, FINANCE_NUM, CREATAE, CREATETIME, ISVA, REMARK
mapper.insert: insert into erp_finance (FINANCE_ID, FINANCE_SERIAL, FINANCE_NUM, CREATAE, CREATETIME, ISVA, REMARK) values (#{financeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financeSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financeNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isva,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select UUID()
insert into erp_finance
FINANCE_ID,
FINANCE_SERIAL,
FINANCE_NUM,
CREATAE,
CREATETIME,
ISVA,
REMARK,
#{financeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{financeSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{financeNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{creatae,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isva,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update erp_finance
FINANCE_SERIAL = #{financeSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_NUM = #{financeNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATAE = #{creatae,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISVA = #{isva,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FINANCE_ID = #{financeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update erp_finance set FINANCE_SERIAL = #{financeSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_NUM = #{financeNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATAE = #{creatae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISVA = #{isva,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FINANCE_ID = #{financeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select finance_serial from erp_finance where finance_serial like concat(concat('%'#{date}),'%') order by createtime desc limit 1;

select
from erp_finance where isva =1 limit 0,1;

select
from erp_finance
( createtime like concat('%',#{pricer},'%') or finance_num like concat('%',#{pricer},'%') or creatae like concat('%',#{pricer},'%') )
and isva =0;
